# VSOpenTVProviderSettingsURLString

**Global Variable**

A URL string you use to deep link to the system’s TV Provider settings.

## Declaration

```swift
let VSOpenTVProviderSettingsURLString: String
```

## Discussion

Pass this URL to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIApplication/open(_:options:completionHandler:)] to open the Settings app and show the TV Provider settings.
title: VSOpenTVProviderSettingsURLString
